name: myOZexp Palmerston Lodge
description:
More fun than a share house, cheaper than a hostel! myOZexp Lodge is a small, friendly, heritage-listed lodge that accepts interstate, regional Western Australia and international Travellers aged between 18-35 ONLY. We're located in Northbridge, which is a great zone close to the city with an entertainment precinct and free buses.

Perfect for backpackers, international student and working holiday makers! Most of our visitors stay longer than the average backpacker, with many staying a month or more. Many come for a few days and then decide to extend longer as they find their second family at the lodge.

We're a chilled out, comfortable place with newly renovated common areas and bathroom and a friendly family-like atmosphere. Cheaper rates with longer stays. Common areas are cleaned twice a day

THE FUN STUFF
- Weekend excursions;
- Meet travellers from all over the world
- Movie nights, BBQ nights, Pub crawl nights

SAVE SOME MONEY
- Free bus to city centre
- Long term rates
- Free WiFi
- Only $2.00 for washing machine

During the COVID-19 pandemic we converted dorms in private rooms

RECEPTION
There is no reception; the lodge booking coordinator will be in contact to organise check in, and available by phone for any questions. 

NOTES
You MUST fill out the online check in form (https://zfrmz.com/lgndwG3LIyYBoe6QGF0e) ATLEAST 24HOURS before your check in date and $50 will be charge on your credit card as security deposit once you filled out the form. You will lose the booking and deposit will not be refunded if you fail to fill out the form and fail to pay for the security deposit. After this you will be entitled to stay at the premises. You will receive all this information from our Booking Coordinator by email.

CHECK IN requirements
- IMPORTANT NOTICE: This hostel is for 18-35 year old ONLY
- Digital copy of a valid overseas passport or other official ID
- Payment of the deposit of $50
- Check in is after 2:00 pm

CHECK OUT
-IMPORTANT NOTICE: This hostel is for 18-35 year old ONLY.
- The check out time is before 10:30 am. Please put your bed sheets in the baskets in the laundry
- Clear your cabinet and don't leave personal items in the room or food/drinks in the fridge
- The $50 deposit will be returned to your credit card after your checkout on the following Wednesday

LODGE RULES
- No noise after 10:00 pm both inside and outside areas
- $10 penalty will be deducted from deposit when failing to:
- Wash your dishes after your meals and leave the kitchen or common areas untidy after use.
- Keep your noise low after 10:00 pm and need to be asked to quiet down
- Repeated (>3x) violation of house rules might result in eviction without refund
- Smoking only in outside areas, smoking in any inside areas will result in eviction without refund
- Antisocial behavior will not be tolerated and you will be removed without refund.

houseRules.notes:
NOTE

You MUST fill out the online check in form (https://zfrmz.com/ygYsV581MeCJ5FNWvsaP) ATLEAST 24HOURS before your check in date, once received we will send you an invoice for the $50 deposit and remaining balance for you to pay. You will lose the booking and deposit will not be refunded if you fail to fill out the form and fail to pay for the security deposit and remaining balance. After this you will be entitled to stay at the premises. You will receive all this information from our Booking Coordinator by email.

Once we received your Check-in form completed, we will send you instructions on how to access your room and pay for your stay. It's important that you complete this form as soon as possible.
If you booked a bed for a friend please forward this email to him/her and ask to fill the form as well.

METHOD OF PAYMENTS AND DEPOSIT REFUND:

CREDIT CARD WITH SURCHARGE OF 2%
We will send you an electronic invoice to your email address and you can pay online using your credit card. A payment of $50 deposit is a check-in requirement. The deposit will be returned to your credit card after your check-out on the following Wednesday.

TERMS AND CONDITIONS:

CHECK IN 
- Official ID: Digital copy of a valid overseas passport or other official ID is required
- Deposit: payment of $50 security deposit is required
- Check in: after 2:00 pm for regular bookings
- Check in: after 6:00 pm for same day bookings (we need to organize cleaning staff to prepare your room)

CHECK OUT
- The check out time is before 9 am. Please put your bed sheets in the baskets in the laundry
- Clear your cabinet and don't leave personal items in the room or food/drinks in the fridge
- The $50 deposit will be returned to your credit card after your checkout on the following Wednesday

LODGE RULES
- No noise after 10:00 pm both inside and outside areas
- $10 penalty will be deducted from deposit when failing to:
- Wash your dishes after your meals and leave the kitchen or common areas untidy after use.
- Keep your noise low after 10:00 pm and need to be asked to quiet down
- Repeated (>3x) violation of house rules might result in eviction without refund
- Smoking only in outside areas, smoking in any inside areas will result in eviction without refund
- Antisocial behavior will not be tolerated and you will be removed without refund.
